title: Night Demon: Book 1
description: Lilian, a thirteen-year-old factory worker in an industrialising town plagued by a serial killer, can see an invisible affliction within other people. When her search for her missing best friend ends with a confrontation with a demon — and learning that the affliction turns humans into demons — another demon named Lucian saves her life and promises answers. Her first clue is that demons are responsible for the many murders. Unfortunately, Lilian’s new lead has problems of his own — Demon Hunters, who claim Lucian is the serial killer and who see Lilian as an accessory.A claustrophobic classic horror story with a dark fantasy twist and edge-of-your-chair suspense. An adventure through a nightmare.A good read for Fans of classic horror served straight and who love dark fantasy with spectacular world-building and epic fights.
author: Stephen Wolberius
